name: Beer Wars
description: In this game you will be a nameless Jedi who fights for the good side of the force in an attempt to save a Jedi temple from the wrath of the Empire's Death Star, and to help you in your journey there will be special beers that you can drink to get advantages. It's a turn-based roguelike game where you have to defeat waves of stormtroopers only with your light-saber and your beers in order to win the game
